title: Free Love
description: In 1920s Greenwich Village, poet Olivia Brown revels in the freedom of her neighborhood, where artists, actors, and writers gather and romance isn't played by any rules. Olivia does as she likes, dresses as she likes, and loves as she likes -- until the night she trips over a the body of a dead woman. Olivia then finds herself on the trail of a killer bent on a most personal revenge.
author: Annette Meyers
